biotools.summary: Simul 6 is a software for electrophoresis simulating the movement of ions in liquid solutions in an electric field. It simulates the movement of ions in liquid solutions in an electric field. It solves numerically a set of nonlinear partial differential equations and nonlinear algebraic equations describing the continuity of ionic movement and acid-base equilibria.
